ability.title: Ambush
ability.text: Once combat has begun with this creature, the investigator no longer has the option to flee it, but must instead fight until one or the other is defeated.

ability.title: Physical Immunity
ability.text: A Weapon or Spell that adds a physical bonus provides none of its normal bonus against monsters with physical immunity.

ability.title: Endless
ability.text: A monster with this ability cannot be collected as a monster trophy. Instead, each time it is defeated, return it to the cup.

ability.title: Magical Immunity
ability.text: A Weapon or Spell that adds a magical bonus provides none of its normal bonus against monsters with magical immunity.

ability.title: Magical Resistance
ability.text: A Weapon or Spell that adds a magical bonus can only provide half its normal bonus (rounded up) against monsters with Magical Resistance.

ability.title: Physical Resistance
ability.text: A Weapon or Spell that adds a physical bonus can only provide half its normal bonus (rounded up) against monsters with Physical Resistance.

ability.title: Weapon Immunity
ability.text: A Weapon that adds a bonus to combat provides none of its normal bonus. Spells are not affected.

ability.title: Nightmarish 1
ability.text: Any investigator that passes a Horror check when facing this monster still loses 1 Sanity. This ability doesn’t apply if the investigator fails the Horror check.

ability.title: Nightmarish 2
ability.text: Any investigator that passes a Horror check when facing this monster still loses 2 Sanity. This ability doesn’t apply if the investigator fails the Horror check.

ability.title: Nightmarish 3
ability.text: Any investigator that passes a Horror check when facing this monster still loses 3 Sanity. This ability doesn’t apply if the investigator fails the Horror check.

ability.title: Overwhelming 1
ability.text: Any investigator that defeats this monster in combat still loses 1 Stamina. This ability doesn’t apply when the investigator fails his Combat check against the monster.

ability.title: Overwhelming 2
ability.text: Any investigator that defeats this monster in combat still loses 2 Stamina. This ability doesn’t apply when the investigator fails his Combat check against the monster.

ability.title: Overwhelming 3
ability.text: Any investigator that defeats this monster in combat still loses 3 Stamina. This ability doesn’t apply when the investigator fails his Combat check against the monster.
